name: Teacup Adventure
description:
This game was created by : N0thing and  Jirafey

N0thing was a Main Python Programmer. 99% of the logic was created by him(that's a lot of code!). 

Without that amazing person I wouldn't have created this game.

Jirafey was a Minor Python Programmer,  Graphic Designer, SFX & Music Composer, Project Manager

Created: .exe file, all the artwork, changed a few levels in code. Implemented music and SFX to the code.

We are aware of some collision bugs,  time limit was a huge blockade, we couldn't do anything about the bugs because of that.

Note: The game was made NOT WITH UNITY, it was made outside of any game engine, made with mostly pygame library in Python.

How to open up the game:

1) If you are using the installer: (64 bit Windows)

Windows will say that the program cannot be run, however, at the top of the text shown , "More information", click on it at the bottom of the window, there will be another option: "Run anyway"

2) Zip file:  (64 bit Windows)

Extract all. Go to the Teacup Adventure folder, run Teacup Adventure.exe

We are aware of some collision bugs,  time limit was a huge blockade, we couldn't do anything about the bugs because of that.
